attributes.action: Change the Number10 website to provide space to publish public feedback to the PM's response to petitions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The PM is given the opportunity to respond to petitions which is duly published on the Number10 website but the public is not given the same freedom to respond to the PM's reply.  It would make sense for the website to provide space for the public to write a response to the PM's reply to petitions, otherwise how will the PM know what the public think of his decision's?

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
